@patch('time.sleep')

def test_do_something(mock_sleep):
   mock_sleep.return_value = True
   do_something()

test_do_something()
ok
from mock import patch
import time
def do_something():
    if time.sleep(100):
        print 'ok'
    else:
        print 'ko'

@patch('time.sleep')
def test_do_something(mock_sleep):
    mock_sleep.return_value = True
    do_something()

@patch('time.sleep')
def test_do_something(mock_sleep):
    mock_sleep.return_value = False
    do_something()

test_do_something()
ko
